mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.week_name FROM package_management_config a LEFT JOIN package_management_config_week b ON a.id = b.package_management_config_id
SELECT a.*, GROUP_CONCAT(b.week_name) as week_name FROM package_management_config a LEFT JOIN package_management_config_week b ON a.id = b.package_management_config_id where a.id=#{idu} GROUP BY a.id
